statements: DELETE FROM palm_vein_biometrics WHERE user_id = 123 AND scan_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM palm_vein_biometrics WHERE id IN (10, 20, 30);
DELETE FROM palm_vein_authentication WHERE user_id = 100 AND authentication_result = FALSE;
DELETE FROM palm_vein_authentication WHERE user_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM palm_vein_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
DELETE FROM PalmVeinDevices WHERE status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM PalmVeinDevices WHERE status = FALSE AND location LIKE 'Offsite%';
